Description: Coverage of the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. Framed not just as fiscal policy but as "Economic Nationalism" linked to tariffs and migrant expulsion.
Reports on a plan to "forcibly displace" Palestinians to redevelop Gaza as a real estate asset. Treated as a bold geopolitical realignment.
Podcast coverage arguing Trump is the "only figure" capable of holding the GOP coalition together. Framed the election as existential.
Coverage of GOP primary debates focusing entirely on the "absent sovereign." Other candidates dismissed as "unviable" understudies.
Podcast discussion on "legislative acts of oblivion." Argues for amnesty/forgetting regarding Jan 6 to avoid "fracturing" society.
Reporting on the executive order to abolish birthright citizenship (14th Amendment). Framed as a necessary challenge to constitutional norms.
Historian Antony Beevor compares Trump's "Trump 2.0" style to Putin. Investigates the shift toward "unrestrained executive power."
Deep dive into the "Ideas Behind Trump 2.0." Explicitly details the plan to dismantle the civil service and federal judiciary.
Coverage claims Trump seeks peace in Ukraine/Middle East. Juxtaposes his "strongman" domestic tactics with a "peacemaker" global image.

Specific Mention/Context: "President Donald Trump... 2017 tax cuts." Linked to broader "economic nationalism."
Implication: Positions tax cuts as part of a nationalist rather than purely supply-side agenda.

Specific Mention/Context: Mention of "tariffs, trade barriers" as "espoused by the Republican ticket."
Implication: Reframes protectionism as a standard platform of the "populist right."
Links industrial policy directly to immigration restrictionism.

Specific Mention/Context: Phil Magness discusses tariffs from the "founding through the end of the Second World War."
Implication: Provides historical cover for the rejection of modern free-trade agreements.

Strategic Goal: Bypass congressional gridlock to implement radical change.
Dismantle the "Deep State" and civil service protections.
Redefine the constitutional basis of American citizenship.
Specific Mention/Action: Executive order to abolish birthright citizenship (14th Amd).

Strategic Goal: Shift US alignment toward illiberal strongman leadership styles.
